title: Arantza Lira
text:
Welcome
Welcome to my website! My name is Arantza Lira and its my pleasure to introduce myself to you! Currently I’m a junior at UC Santa Barbara studying for my Bachelors of Science in Environmental Studies. Although I’ve spent the last three years near the beach, i grew up in the desert in a border town in southern California called Calexico. Although I cherish my hometown, the environmental health issues from unsustainable agricultural practices and climate impacts inspired me to pursue a degree in environmental studies focusing on food accessibility, agricultural systems and environmental data science. As you learn more about my journey feel free to navigate to the tabs on this page to learn more about me,my projects, my resume and hobbies.

title: About me
text: Aside from learning about the outdoors in my studies, I love to spend time outside exploring with my pets, whether its going on walks. Recently, I’ve gotten more involved in gardening at the UCSB Wetland space managed by the American Indian and Indigenous Students Center. Although we cannot consume plants in this space due to the historic contamination by the university, it’s been a great experience to tend to the vegetation in this area and be in community with my friends. Here are some pictures of my pets, gardening, and side crafts!
